Keywords: All-Star Squadron , Amazon , Justice Society , Warrior
Real Name: Diana
Special Powers
80 YEARS OF WONDER WOMAN: Wonder Woman has [Wonder Woman Ally team ability] and may start the game with any Wonder Woman Equipment equipped.
CAVALRY CHARGE: Charge, but do not halve speed. When Wonder Woman uses it, after resolutions, knock back each adjacent opposing character 2 squares.
